title: Ones who have an internship
content: can yall pls share what mightve prolly got u an internship (at pesu labs) as its shortlisted based on resume??i mean waht stood out the most

comments.body:
If you're talking about the centre of excellences, almost anybody can get in. 

If you're talking about PESU Innovation Lab, or PESU Venture Labs (PIL/PVL), then it's purely skill based. The method of shortlisting varies but it's mostly about resume, portraying your skills the best way possible, network to an extent, etc
